hero.blurb: Fullstack developer specialized in internal systems and business process automation. Experience with React, Next.js, Nest.js, Supabase, LangChain and n8n to build innovative solutions that optimize operations.

about.p1: Fullstack developer with experience in internal systems, business process automation and computer hardware repair. Specialized in React, Next.js, Nest.js, Supabase and AI technologies.
about.p2: Background in Accounting and Finance with a strong focus on tech solutions for business. Over 8 projects delivered for business management in shipping, exports and retail.
